headline: Veeam Names Allison Cerra as Chief Marketing Officer
summary: SEATTLE, November 11, 2025--New Veeam CMO brings experience from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, McAfee, Intel and Alcatel-Lucent

content.title: Veeam Names Allison Cerra as Chief Marketing Officer
content.summary: SEATTLE, November 11, 2025--New Veeam CMO brings experience from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, McAfee, Intel and Alcatel-Lucent

thumbnail.caption: Veeam® Software, the #1 global leader in Data Resilience, has appointed Allison Cerra as Chief Marketing Officer (CMO). Her prior leadership roles include Hewlett Packard Enterprise, McAfee, Intel, and Alcatel-Lucent, giving her a unique perspective across enterprise technology, cybersecurity, and cloud innovation.

headline: What is hybrid AI? Analyst explains what more companies are doing
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) is hosting its analyst day at the Nasdaq on Tuesday, which could prove to be a pivotal moment as the AI chip race with competitor Nvidia (NVDA) tightens. TECHnalysis Research, LLC president Bob O'Donnell sits down with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to explain what hybrid AI (artificial intelligence) and why he is bullish on the dynamic of hyperscalers building out AI infrastructure and investing in physical AI data centers and GPUs. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: What is hybrid AI? Analyst explains what more companies are doing
content.description:
Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) is hosting its analyst day at the Nasdaq on Tuesday, which could prove to be a pivotal moment as the AI chip race with competitor Nvidia (NVDA) tightens.

TECHnalysis Research, LLC president Bob O'Donnell sits down with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to explain what hybrid AI (artificial intelligence) and why he is bullish on the dynamic of hyperscalers building out AI infrastructure and investing in physical AI data centers and GPUs.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
